interestingFact: China is home to the Great Wall, the longest man-made structure in the world.
India is the birthplace of yoga, a spiritual and physical discipline practiced worldwide.
The U.S. has the world’s largest economy and is the birthplace of the internet.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area, spanning 11 time zones.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Japan has more than 6,800 islands and is known for its advanced technology and unique traditions.
South Africa is the only country in the world with three capital cities.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
